entry.name: animated
entry.title: :animated Selector
entry.desc: Select all elements that are in the progress of an animation at the time the selector is run.

longdesc.p: Note: If you use a custom jQuery build without the effects module, the :animated selector will throw an error.

example.desc: Change the color of any div that is animated.
example.css: div { background:yellow; border:1px solid #AAA; width:80px; height:80px; margin:0 5px; float:left; } div.colored { background:green; }
